title: An 80-Week, Randomized, Multi-Center, Parallel-Group, Double-Blind Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Atorvastatin 80 MG Plus an Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitor Versus an Acetylcholinesterase Inhibitor Alone in the Treatment of Mild to Moderate Alzheimer's Disease.
